Text: Yepp this work's very well. thank's man
The piratebay is going under...where else will you be uploading these?

Does anyone have the patch that will prevent FBP from the automatic update? I have had FBP for quite some time now, and at one point, I needed an update, but no one had up'd it yet. FBP started popping up a window saying that I needed to update, and would not let me use the program until I did so. I used to have a patch that took care of that, but I no longer have it. Can anyone help?
Can you explain to me how to delete old versions of this in detail?  It won't let me delete the files from my programs list after uninstall.

Download/patching etc is perfect, craked with no problems at all.
But, the program doesn't seem to be working as the previous versions. It jumps a lot, skips a few profiles and adds people very slowly even with the time delay set between a 0 - 0 seconds duration.
I keep having to press the 'forward' button located at the top next to the address bar to 'remind' it (if you will) to proceed to the next add/profile.
Since they have altered and modified the captcha bypass images/settings, the program never makes a 'blip' noise to indicate that the captcha is required for that add. I just guessed that around 12-15 adds, it shall require this implementation.
It used to be an efficient and quick program. Now it just seems slow, sloppy and somewhat defected.
Have i done something incorrectly? Suggestions?
Thanks for uploading though. Much appreciated.

Additionally, could this be something to do with the version? According to the official website, the latest is v10.6.8.
Could someone crack the latest version? Might rectify some problems.
I have the latest version cracked...just not at home right now to upload it.  Check back Saturday/Sunday!
Have you had a chance to upload 10.7.1 yet? THANKS!
